pageProps.pageTitle: Get iTwin Inferences - PnID to iTwin | iTwin Platform

initialApis.name: pnid-to-itwin-v2
initialApis.description: Recognize symbols and tags from a raster PnID.

api.name: pnid-to-itwin-v2
api.description: Recognize symbols and tags from a raster PnID.

items.name: create-inference
items.description:
---
Creates new PnID Inference for a specific model version. This endpoint registers a new inference pipeline in Azure Machine Learning service with already trained PnID (Piping & Instrumentation Diagrams) ML model. To create new PnID Inference please provide iTwin ID and model version. All available model versions are listed in the [Model versions](/apis/pnid-to-itwin-v2/model-versions/) section.

### Authentication

Requires `Authorization` header with valid Bearer token for scope `itwin-platform`.

For more documentation on authorization and how to get access token visit [OAUTH2 Authorization](https://developer.bentley.com/apis/overview/authorization/) page.

---

responses.description: Inference created successfully.

This response indicates that request lacks valid authentication credentials. Access token might not been provided, issued by the wrong issuer, does not have required scopes or request headers were malformed.
The user has insufficient permissions for the requested operation.
The 422 (Unprocessable Entity) status code indicates that the request cannot be processed by the server due to a client error (e.g. malformed request syntax)

headers.name: retry-after
headers.description: The number of requests exceeds the rate-limit for the client subscription.

responses.description: This response indicates that the user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

items.name: get-itwin-inferences
items.description:
---

Returns all PnID Inferences in iTwin.

### Authentication

Requires `Authorization` header with valid Bearer token for scope `itwin-platform`.

For more documentation on authorization and how to get access token visit [OAUTH2 Authorization](https://developer.bentley.com/apis/overview/authorization/) page.

---

parameters.name: iTwinId
parameters.description: Id of the iTwin that created the PnID Inference.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Optional max items to be sent in response.

parameters.name: $continuationToken
parameters.description: Optional token to retrieve next page in paginated response.

queryParameters.name: iTwinId
queryParameters.description: Id of the iTwin that created the PnID Inference.

queryParameters.name: $top
queryParameters.description: Optional max items to be sent in response.

queryParameters.name: $continuationToken
queryParameters.description: Optional token to retrieve next page in paginated response.

items.name: upload-inference-input-content
items.description:
---

Uploads a file or replace the existing file if one already exists with the same name as PnID Inference Input.

### Authentication

Requires `Authorization` header with valid Bearer token for scope `itwin-platform`.

For more documentation on authorization and how to get access token visit [OAUTH2 Authorization](https://developer.bentley.com/apis/overview/authorization/) page.

---

templateParameters.name: inferenceId
templateParameters.description: Id of the created PnID Inference.

parameters.name: inferenceId
parameters.description: Id of the created PnID Inference.

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Indicates inference input content type. Supported content types for this operation are: `application/pdf`, `image/jpeg`, `image/png`, `image/bmp`.

headers.name: Content-Disposition
headers.description: Indicates inference input content filename. Content-Disposition possible header format: `attachment; filename="filename.pdf"`.

responses.description: Successfully uploaded Inference Input content.

This response indicates that request lacks valid authentication credentials. Access token might not been provided, issued by the wrong issuer, does not have required scopes or request headers were malformed.
The user has insufficient permissions for the requested operation.
Specified Inference was not found.
PnID Inference Input content cannot be updated due to other resource being used.
Content type of file is not supported.

headers.name: retry-after
headers.description: The number of requests exceeds the rate-limit for the client subscription.

responses.description: This response indicates that the user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.
